p: Herbal treatments are the most popular form of traditional medicine and commonly used as primary health care ( 10). All parts of cashew tree (mainly leaf and stem bark) have been extensively used as traditional herbal medicine, contributing health benefits all over the world ( Table 2) ( 12, 37, 38).
